entry_text: 500 error on /login endpoint under high traffic
resolution: Restart the auth microservice and scale up instances during peak hours.

entry_text: Repeated 429 errors from EU IPs on /search
resolution: Increase rate limit for EU region or implement exponential backoff in clients.

entry_text: 403 error when accessing /admin with valid token
resolution: Check token scope and permission mapping on RBAC service.
Investigate backend sync job for latency and split into smaller tasks if needed.
Validate payload schema on client before sending request.
